import React from"react";import{useAuth0}from"@auth0/auth0-react";var LogoutButton=()=>{var _useAuth=useAuth0(),logout=_useAuth.logout;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{className:"btn btn-danger btn-block",onClick:()=>logout({returnTo:window.location.origin})},"Log Out");};export default LogoutButton;
